code: import React from'react';import Project from'./Project';import'./Projects.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const foodflowDes='FoodFlow is a full-stack web application designed to bridge the gap between food donors and those in need.
